channel.title: American, English and French people are NOT(?) stupid
channel.description:
[url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=fJuNgBkloFE]Americans are NOT stupid[/url], or [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=3ghdwINqirU]are they?[/url] [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=w_mkwB9ayK4&feature=related]English people are also NOT stupid[/url] [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=m0CjrNgK0zw]French people are stupid[/url]
Discuss.

item.title: American, English and French people are NOT(?) stupid
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:23, topic:212716”][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=280125.msg2280256#msg2280256 date=1213655904]
A lot of German scientists made the American space program possible. If WWII didn’t occur, we were still living like people were in the early 20th century.
[/quote]

Actually if the Cold War did not happen then we would not have anything.[/quote]

We would have quite a lot, but not that much as we have now.

Read full topic
item.source: American, English and French people are NOT(?) stupid

item.title: American, English and French people are NOT(?) stupid
item.dc:creator: @_Vengeance _Vengeance
item.description:
@_Vengeance wrote:

[quote=“billygotshot, post:11, topic:212716”][quote author=lordbost link=topic=280125.msg2278788#msg2278788 date=1213577022]

We invented the atomic bomb.

i bet human kind will end in a atomic war, so not exactly a smart invention.
[/quote]

The human race was doomed the day we all were made. If it was not invented we would all die anyways. There is no way to stop the inevitable.[/quote]

Germany was also experimenting with atomic bombs. If America didn’t do it, Germany would of.

item.source: American, English and French people are NOT(?) stupid

item.title: American, English and French people are NOT(?) stupid
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Andrewsouls, post:15, topic:212716”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=280125.msg2279138#msg2279138 date=1213593099]
If I had a choice and my own life I would not being doing that. Honestly I have no money, no car, nothing really because I am still just a kid. When I actually get a chance to do it I am going to. I also do learn alot of shit all the time. I hang out with my friends whenever I get a chance. I am not talking about some kid or something. Most people are starting to want to do nothing. Not young kids but adults. Lets use my brother as an example. All he does is go out with girls, fail at school, smoke pot, and drink. He is 19 years old. Right now he has nothing to go forward to. This is what people are starting to head towards.
[/quote]
That’s like my brother. And we live in Australia. Except he is at his last year at school.
He goes out with guys, is okay at school, smokes pot, and binge drinks. He is only 18. He has a little more to look forward to, but wait until he is 19 :P![/quote]

Notice the “is okay at school” part. My brother would rather do anything aslong as he does not have to learn how to do it.

Read full topic
item.source: American, English and French people are NOT(?) stupid

If I had a choice and my own life I would not being doing that. Honestly I have no money, no car, nothing really because I am still just a kid. When I actually get a chance to do it I am going to. I also do learn alot of shit all the time. I hang out with my friends whenever I get a chance. I am not talking about some kid or something. Most people are starting to want to do nothing. Not young kids but adults. Lets use my brother as an example. All he does is go out with girls, fail at school, smoke pot, and drink. He is 19 years old. Right now he has nothing to go forward to. This is what people are starting to head towards.

That’s like my brother. And we live in Australia. Except he is at his last year at school.
He goes out with guys, is okay at school, smokes pot, and binge drinks. He is only 18. He has a little more to look forward to, but wait until he is 19 :P!

item.title: American, English and French people are NOT(?) stupid
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“Cruzer, post:13, topic:212716”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=280125.msg2278650#msg2278650 date=1213573974]

But there is some smart to like Moparisthebest.
[/quote]…

Except that he made Moparscape.
No human are perfect.

The only smart people are those who are from pure Germanic blood.

[size=1pt]wow that was a racist remark.[/size]

Like Hitler?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2008, 20:59:00[/size][hr]This one is good to: http://youtube.com/watch?v=iDIsOqq6yko
http://youtube.com/watch?v=Qv8yLT6jM04

You sir are so smart. You sure can say americans are stupid…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 15, 2008, 05:30:19 PM[/size][hr][quote author=R.I.P RSC link=topic=280125.msg2278493#msg2278493 date=1213570346]
The only smart people are those who are from pure Germanic blood.

[size=1pt]wow that was a racist remark.[/size]
[/quote][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=280125.msg2278778#msg2278778 date=1213576685]

@billy That’s true, but that’s mainly because
1. People think americans are stupid, mainly because Bush is…
2. Some people believe everything they see, and for some reason, americans don’t have a… good reputation, regarding intelligence.

No Americans don’t have a good reputation regarding intelligence because people gave it to us. We invented the atomic bomb. We invented the Hydrogen bomb. We landed on the moon first. We helped out Britain’s ass in WWII. We probably have this reputation for being stupid because of the people who don’t care about anything other than entertainment. Right now over half of the American population does not give a shit about learning. They would rather sit on their ass and stair at a television instead of going out to learn, hang out, explore, etc.
[/quote]
You probably being one of them[/quote]

If I had a choice and my own life I would not being doing that. Honestly I have no money, no car, nothing really because I am still just a kid. When I actually get a chance to do it I am going to. I also do learn alot of shit all the time. I hang out with my friends whenever I get a chance. I am not talking about some kid or something. Most people are starting to want to do nothing. Not young kids but adults. Lets use my brother as an example. All he does is go out with girls, fail at school, smoke pot, and drink. He is 19 years old. Right now he has nothing to go forward to. This is what people are starting to head towards.

Read full topic

No Americans don’t have a good reputation regarding intelligence because people gave it to us. We invented the atomic bomb. We invented the Hydrogen bomb. We landed on the moon first. We helped out Britain’s ass in WWII. We probably have this reputation for being stupid because of the people who don’t care about anything other than entertainment. Right now over half of the American population does not give a shit about learning. They would rather sit on their ass and stair at a television instead of going out to learn, hang out, explore, etc.[/quote]

item.title: American, English and French people are NOT(?) stupid
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

Every country in the world has some amount of stupid people. I could go into any country and ask questions about their country and get completely stupid responses. I read 15-20 comments on the American video and they all contained remarks about how stupid america was. Then I read 15-20 comments on the british video and they were mainly defending the british intelligence. It is stupid that people think they are better then other people.
